name: Verify a client can be found and deleted from the admin panel
description: This test verifies that a Bank Manager can locate a customer via the search bar and permanently remove them from the system using the Delete button.
descriptionHtml: This test verifies that a Bank Manager can locate a customer via the search bar and permanently remove them from the system using the Delete button.
statusMessage: Row count should decrease by 1 after deleting a customer. expected [4] but found [0]

steps.name: Navigate to admin panel by clicking Bank Manager Login
Open Customers list in admin panel
Get number of rows currently displayed in Customers table
Search for customer by name: Hermoine
Get number of rows currently displayed in Customers table
Get number of rows currently displayed in Customers table

attachments.name: Screenshot: Delete client - incorrect row count after delete
